title: Jessie Singer: "There Are No Accidents"
description: Michael talks with Jessie Singer, author of "There Are No Accidents: The Deadly Rise of Injury and Disaster—Who Profits and Who Pays the Price." Original air date 10 March 2022. The book was published on 15 February 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Jessie Singer, Dan Henning, TC Scornavacchi)
